summary: INKZ NYC - Inkz was established in 2011 with one mission: to bring a real, high quality Print Shop to the NEW YORK CITY area. Our passion for excellence is what inspired us in the beginning and it continues to drive us today. We pride ourselves in the superior experience of shopping in our Print Shop and in the long-term relationships we’ve built with our customers. People come back to Inkz because they know they’ll get nothing but the best in customer service.
